item.title: Manav Sethi steps down as Alt Balaji’s CMO
item.author: Sonam Saini
item.description:
Alt Balaji’s Manav Sethi has stepped down as Chief Marketing Officer.

A source close to the development has confirmed the news to exchange4media. Sethi served his last day on August 31.

Sethi joined Balaji Telefilm’s digital arm in January 2017 and was overseeing the company's communications strategy in India and the international expansion.

Prior to joining Alt Balaji, Sethi was the Group Chief Marketing Officer (India & Malaysia) with Askme.com. He also worked At Reliance Big Entertainment, he launched India's local search business BigMaps and managed corporate strategy across the group.
